author: ajsutton
content: And looking at the spec (https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/specs/phase0/validator.md#eth1-data) `eth1_chain` is all blocks on the eth1 chain and then `is_candidate_block` filters entirely based on time.
